Description: On US-1 in the County of Fairfax, in the vicinity of Buckman Rd; Rt. 836N/S (Fairfax County), motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. The north left shoulder, left lane, and right lane are closed. All south lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Multi-Vehicle Crash
